attributes.action: Stop kids TV programmes at 20:00 each night Sunday to Thursday inclsive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help parents control the time children watch TV, childrens programmes should not be shown after 20:00 on Sunday through till Thursday nights. This would help children get a good night sleep and be ready to take full advantage of school the next day WITHOUT degrading their social time.
